Articles.Content:
A little Rover that i made that uses the new seats and wheels and reminded me of an old Hotrod car.

top speed is in the 20-24 range but when above 15 i recommend minimal turning. It comes with a remote control feature (probe in it) so you can drive up to your kerbals and pick them up then they can sit in our state of the art chair and drive all they want.As your kerbal drives in his comfy seat he will rest assured that his bad driving will not result in death for our Hotrod has double pained armor to protect your fragile kerbal (unless you know there falling from thousands of feet high then they just bounce ). Hope you like.

actiong groups

1 - antenna's

2 - solar panel (has 2 rtgs but if your in hurry to fill up there ya go)

3 - ladder

Craft file :Mini Hot Rod Dowload

during this picture i was driving 20 trying to break the solar panel off (couldn't do it don't know why)
